hero.title: TMC Model Colony
hero.subtitle: Complain Registration Portal
hero.description: Dear Citizen, Thank you for contacting the TMC Model Colony Complaint Center. We are here to help with your concerns. Please let us know how we can assist you.

footer.copyright: Â© year TMC Model Colony Complaint Portal
footer.title: TMC Model Colony

complaintCategories.departmentDescription: To file a new complaint, select your department and provide your details.
complaintCategories.selectDepartmentError: Please select a department before proceeding!

detailsPage.title: Submit Your Complaint
detailsPage.subtitle: We value your feedback. Please fill in the details below to register your complaint.
detailsPage.detailsPlaceholder: Please describe your complaint in detail...
detailsPage.invalidPhoneNumber: Please enter a valid phone number
detailsPage.errorMessage: Failed to submit complaint. Please try again later.

trackingPage.title: Track Your Complaints
trackingPage.subtitle: Enter your complaint ID to search for a specific complaint or browse your recent complaints below.
trackingPage.noComplaintsMessage: You haven't submitted any complaints yet.

aboutPage.title: About TMC Model Colony
aboutPage.missionText: To provide efficient and transparent services to the residents of Model Colony.

profilePage.authMessage: Please sign in or create an account to access your profile and manage your complaints.
profilePage.termsMessage: By signing in, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy
